name: The Legend of Zelda: Voyager of Time
storyline: The game starts out with Link having nightmares of his past adventures. The Deku Tree Sprout, descendant of the Great Deku Tree has summoned Link because he has sensed great evil growing lately. Link is sent on a quest to help out with the growing problems in Hyrule.
summary: A mod for The Legend of Zelda: Ocarina of Time that includes a new story and updated environments
